name: Faelyn Nightbreeze
title: Innkeeper
description: A serene elf with silver hair and gentle eyes. Her inn is a peaceful sanctuary infused with the calm of the surrounding forest.

greeting.first_time: Mae govannen, traveler. Welcome to the Moonlit Glade. I am Faelyn. May I offer you rest beneath our trees?
greeting.returning: You return to us. The forest welcomes you back.
greeting.tired: You carry weariness like a heavy cloak. Let us ease your burden.

main_menu.text: How may I serve you this evening?

rent_room.text: A room among the branches? 45 gold for a night's rest in harmony with nature. You will wake refreshed, as if the forest itself has renewed you.
rent_room.success: Your room awaits. The trees will watch over you. Sleep well.

buy_drink.text: May I offer you moonberry wine? A specialty of our house. 6 gold.
buy_drink.success: Here you are. May it bring you peace.

ask_about_entertainment.text: We welcome musicians who understand the language of the forest. Speak with Theren by the entrance—he selects only those whose music complements our tranquil atmosphere.

goodbye.text: Namárië. May the stars light your path.
